name: Cave Escape (itch) (The Gamedev Cave)
description:
in Cave Escape you'll have to platform your way through a number of challenges. When you reach the end of a challenge, the game will randomly decide which path opens up for you to continue through until you reach one of the end goals, you could get lucky and find a goal in only a couple of these dice rolls! or, the game could send you though a whole adventure until you finally manage to escape! 

use WASD or the arrow keys to move and SPACE to jump. You can exit the game by pressing the ESCAPE key.
